text: Yakovlivka (; ) is a village in Yasynuvata Raion (district) in Donetsk Oblast of eastern Ukraine, at 9.9 km NNE from the centre of Donetsk city, on the right bank of the Kalmius river. The settlement was taken under control of Russian forces during the War in Donbass, that started in mid-April 2014. ==Demographics== In 2001 the settlement had 969 inhabitants. title: Yakovlivka, Yasynuvata Raion
